Announcements

The next talk will be on Thursday, 18 October, 20:00-21:30, in the auditorium of the Mercè Rodoreda building (UPF, Ciutadella campus). We will hear from Oscar Chacon and Helena Olea about the situation of immigrants in the United States. More details will be posted soon.



Latest Talk


Europe's Retreat from Refugee Protection and Fundamental Rights


Cristina Mas, Journalist, Ara, and Lorenzo Gabrielli, Interdisciplinary Research Group on Immigration, Department of Political and Social Sciences, UPF
